overview: Terry Cross is a consultant to early-stage companies in business strategy and capital structure and formation. Through his company, Windward Associates, LLC, he has assisted in raising over $ 100 mil. Prior to founding Windward in 2002, he spent 7 years in the machine tool industry followed by 28 years in the securities industry at Kidder, Peabody & Co. in Detroit, New York City, and San Francisco where he spent 13 years covering Silicon Valley tech companies and VC firms. In 1999, he co-founded and was Chairman and CEO of Sonoma Photonics of Santa Rosa, CA. where he raised $11.0 million of initial capital. Terry began early-stage private investing in 1962, and has invested in 44 early-stage companies including Napster, PayPal, Novel, DSC Communications, Warehouse Club, Inktomi, Machine Vision, and Google. Terry is a member of the board of directors for Great Lakes Angels, a founding member of The Michigan Venture Capital Association, Chairman of MIST Innovations of Detroit, MI., and a director of RealKidz of Ypsilanti, MI and Municipal Financial Securities Corporation of Grosse Pointe MI, MI. He currently serves as a consultant to several Michigan companies
